Class MessageSourceProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.context.MessageSourceProperties
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.messages") public class MessageSourceProperties extends Object
Configuration properties for Message Source.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Stephane Nicoll, Kedar Joshi, Misagh Moayyed
